Recently Opened:LV Projects Method

Short Name: RecentOpen.LVProjects

Requires: VI Scripting

Class: Application Methods

To Use: Create a method.

Gets the list of most recently used LabVIEW projects from LabVIEW and displays the paths and project names. This method returns the same list as if you selected File»Recent Projects.

Parameters

Data typeNameRequiredDescription
Recently Opened Project PathsYesReturns the list of paths.
Recently Opened Project NamesYesReturns the list of project filenames.

Remarks

The following table lists the characteristics of this method.

Data typeNo return value
Available in Run-Time EngineNo
Available in Real-Time Operating SystemNo
Remote access allowedNo
